meanings.definition: Organisms that cannot produce their own food and must obtain nutrients from other organisms.
meanings.sent1: Heterotrophs rely on getting nutrients from other organisms.
meanings.sent2: The heterotrophs in the forest feed on plants and animals.
meanings.sent3: The party of heterotrophs at the picnic happily shared their snacks.
meanings.sent4: In the circle of life, heterotrophs play the role of consumers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a fun song to explain heterotrophs to the students.

meanings.definition: An organism that relies on consuming other organisms for energy.
meanings.sent1: The heterotrophs in the ocean hunt for smaller creatures to eat.
meanings.sent2: A lion is a classic example of a heterotroph in the animal kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The group of heterotrophs at the party were all meat lovers.
meanings.sent4: In the food chain, heterotrophs are like the ultimate foodies.
meanings.sent5: The documentary explained how heterotrophs obtain energy from their prey.
